website_summaries.verdict: Neato improved on its already-impressive robot vacuums with the BotVac line. Roomba 870 fans might find that Neato's BotVac 85 offers similar features and performance, but you get more accessories (like three filters rather than the 870's two) and much shorter run times.
pros: The $600 BotVac 85 outperformed the other Neato models we've tested and offers more robust accessories and features
cons: Its $600 price tag is definitely verging on high-end and there's still no remote control

customer_reviews.title: Replaced 2 times in 1 year, Died after 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Vacuum in April 2016. It was replaced 2 times in the next year due to problems with vacuum. The battery went dead just after the 1 year mark. I replaced it with a neato battery (priced much higher than "compatibles".) Within 2 months of new battery it stopped working again. Needed new motor. Customer service was no help at this point. I know when to cut my losses. I would not recommend this product or company.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: It has not even been a month since I received it and now the robot can't recognize the house, gets blocked with things that shouldn't like the stove, can't go back to its base and it has serious battery issues that does not allow it to recharge (we did let the battery die twice as recommended in the manual for "better battery optimization"). It spends too much time stuck in a same spot, I don't know if it's because it is malfunctioning or if it is like that by default, regardless, it is a waste or energy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina S.

customer_reviews.title: Lemon Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I had other Neato vacuums which works great. This one worked good for a month and then started to go in circles, not the pattern associated with the vacuum. I called up the seller who referred me to Neato. Called Neato and they had me do some reboot which didn't do anything. Sad to say, the vacuum still does not work so I gave it to a friend's kid to tinker with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the neato while it worked. 6 months into owning the robot it needed replaced. A year into owning the battery needed replaced and was not covered by Neato. 2 years and a week into the buying th robot it has died. Really disappointed in the customer service of Neato. A $500 machine should last more than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW J G BALOUN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing the difference this little thing makes between the 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that we have 5 dogs and I have to clean out what appears to be a dead, furry dirt beast each day from the containment lid. Amazing the difference this little thing makes between the 2 week house cleanings. My wife is tired of me showing her how much crap this thing picks up each day :)
customer_reviews.author: Brad D. Mahon

customer_reviews.title: If you have hard floors and pets, a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where I've been past 10 years but I'm new to robot vacuums. This thing works very well, I am shocked at the amount of pet hair that's trapped/collected into the tray after each cleaning. I have it scheduled to run for every other day. If you have hard floors and pets, a must have!
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I saw a demo of Neato at Costco, but had to wait to buy it. Neato is definitely awesome! Has a huge dust compartment, cleans in a uniform manner (unlike other competitors), & I like that it has the squared off edges to get in corners. Such a huge help in cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: A. Chaney

customer_reviews.title: I love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy! We have used neato for about a month now and couldn't be happier. We have 3 labs that are mostly indoors so LOTS of dog hair. We run him every day to every other day and our floors are always clean now! He does pretty well with cords but I have ran into him getting stuck on smaller rugs. He does better on hard surfaces but still satisfactory on carpet or rugs. Overall very pleased with this product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great vac
customer_reviews.text: Amazing vac, yes it makes some noise, and bumps into furniture, but hey, I can deal with that. Was really surprised and how well it does and does get every room. Mesmerising to watch it at work, stops, scans has a think. Goes back to charge and then makes a B line and continues where it left off
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: The device screen stop working. Couldn’t get help from coustomer care.
customer_reviews.author: karin

customer_reviews.title: It was used, there was no instruction manual, ...
customer_reviews.text: It was used, there was no instruction manual, the outer body was scratched up, there was only one filter and no filter cleaner comb.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Boland

customer_reviews.title: Battery problem!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since I saw many positive feedbacks from this Botvac85 in here, so I have purchased two Neato Botvac85 on Oct 18th, 2015. We only use once and one of them are not working anymore. It shows many error messages.(battery overheat/clean my path/low battery...etc) After we tried the trouble shooting from Neato website, the problem is still exist. Could anyone helps?
customer_reviews.author: Chien-yin Lin

customer_reviews.title: I've had it a little over a year and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a little over a year and it stopped working. Tried everything suggested in the manual to no avail. My next-door neighbor had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can never go back to life before my Neato! ;) every woman deserves one of these
customer_reviews.author: Maria W

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: didn't work side sensor stuck and wouldn't keep charge had to return item
customer_reviews.author: LLisalou

customer_reviews.title: Better than i-Robot at cleaning in a logical manner
customer_reviews.text: Better than i-Robot at cleaning in a logical manner. Reminder for emptying dust bin does not reflect actual need to empty - it's just a tiimer. I have 3 dogs & have to empty after 30 minutes. If I forget, vac get clogged up.
customer_reviews.author: cgt

customer_reviews.title: Mary
customer_reviews.text: I love having this item. Only request would be a more comprehensive instruction guide.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Be forewarned. Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: It worked beautifully at first, but pet fur builds up and breaks the bearing casing. It is advertised as being good for pets, but you need to be careful. I recommend you take off the metal plate and clean thoroughly after every other use. I don't know if this voids the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Potter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE !
customer_reviews.text: Love! 2 dogs , 2 cats . Hardwood floor . Shall I say more ? LOVE my robot !
customer_reviews.author: Charline LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: magnetic avoid strip is useless, needed new battery after 2 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: Cleans adequately BUT Way too many "please clear my path" and nothing is there.Doesn't see stairs and avoid them after a a few months use.magnetic avoid strip is useless, needed new battery after 2 1/2 years.design flaw allows hair to get wound around ball bearing unit on roller and guaranteed you will drop/lose that ball bearing unit when you clean roller.would like to give it 21/2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bill

customer_reviews.title: YES!! LOVE THIS BOTVAC!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, yes, yes!! We have 3 dogs, and it's nearly impossible to keep up with cleaning up all their hair!! I bought the Neato (named Margarita :-)) to help keep our house clean during the week when I don't have time to clean. Margarita does a fabulous job! It took a few times around for her to stop getting stuck on things, but now she does great! The bin is small, but I empty it everyday as soon as I get home from work, a small sacrifice to make when she does such a fabulous job keeping the house clean for me! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this Botvac to everyone!! Don't wait another minute to order this!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Marhon

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought Neato!
customer_reviews.text: His name is Higgins and we love him! Has much more suction than I expected. Very happy with this spontaneous buy. You still need to do base boards but with Higgins running every day, not as often. I have 3 Boxers and we love on the farm. Higgins does our hardwoods and carpets. Delighted friends recommended Neato!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Loving my Neato!!
customer_reviews.text: Update review: 12-1-17 Still going strong ... I had to replace battery but consider that maintenance. Still love it!!! I had my Neato for over a month now and I'm loving it!! I have dogs and it does a great job of getting the hair up. It also does great getting corners that I think the round vacs can't get!! I hope it lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: A Robot for Every Home
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Neato, (as I call him), makes me smile. I sit there staring at him as he cleans my wood floors, carpeting, under and around my furniture and only stops when his battery needs to be recharged. He even knows to go back home to his power station. I'm amazed and totally gleeful by my new acquisition.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Roper

customer_reviews.title: Works great for awhile, needs preventative maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but went through a brush after 6 months and battery after 9 months....Neato support sent me a new battery for free so that's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Jeeves is the robot vacuum of my dreams!
customer_reviews.text: Love this robot vacuum, which gets the floors clean enough to mop. What hours of work it has saved me! We call it Jeeves. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great robot vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: This unit does a great job picking up pet hairs. It tends to get hung up on things like cords, and sometimes gets stuck in a corner. Over all i like it for the lite cleaning of the floors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about a year. Now the battery is dead.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Returned after two weeks. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jones

customer_reviews.title: This little thing is amazing. The Botvac 85 returns to where is left ...
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is amazing. The Botvac 85 returns to where is left off after needing to recharge. It gets the job done. I bought more magnetic strips and laid them under a thicker rug (with maybe 20% sticking out underneath) the Botvac struggled to get over. It now avoids wasting battery power trying to drive up on it and tackles the rest of the house without a problem. Very happy with this little bot. jbc
customer_reviews.author: kelly coulter

customer_reviews.title: Having been delighted with its predecessor
customer_reviews.text: Having been delighted with its predecessor, the XV21, I was hoping to be even more impressed by this unit. Unfortunately that's not the case. The navigation seems to be very poor, and it keeps repeatedly bumping into things until it reports that its path is not clear. When I say "bumps", I mean that it hits hard enough to move a kitchen bar stool! Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Picky

customer_reviews.title: This robot is amazing, but I notice we don't use it much ...
customer_reviews.text: This robot is amazing, but I notice we don't use it much anymore. It would turn on in the middle of the night and start roaming around, which sounds funny, unless you're trying to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

product_meta.title: Neato Botvac 85 Bv85 Robot Vacuum
product_meta.description: Best for homes with pets. The high-performance robot vacuum with all the extras. Features a combo brush that is uniquely designed to pick up pet hair—and is quieter, too, especially on hard floors like wood and tile. Patented laser-guided technology scans and maps the room, plans, and methodically cleans, automatically moving from room to room. 50% larger brush, bigger-is-better dirt bin, extra large filter, and precise edge cleaning brush pick up more dirt and debris. Schedule daily cleanings or push a button for instant multi-room or spot cleaning. Automatically goes back to charge base, then returns to where it left off.
feature_bullets: Let the Neato Botvac BV85 save you time by doing the vacuuming for you
This wireless auto robot vacuum uses laser-guided technology to methodically scan and map any room for a precise clean, from bare floors to carpets
Robot moves automatically from room to room, cleaning edges, under beds and corners
Large brush gets closer to walls, while a dirt bin keeps debris trapped until you're ready to empty its contents
When done cleaning, the robot returns to the charge base, recharge and resumes where you left it

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.7 out of 5 stars93 ratings2.7 out of 5 stars
